name: The Girl of My Dreams
description:
The Girl of My Dreams

Things aren't going so well for Clara: her family is distant, she's struggling in school, and the noise she hears in her head won't leave her alone. After hoping for a miracle and falling asleep, she meets Evie, a mysterious girl who can only exist in her dreams. They become fast friends and could even be something more, if only Clara can stop the outside world from eating her whole.

The Girl of My Dreams is a queer romance visual novel that examines what happens when you meet--well, when you meet the girl of your dreams.

Code and writing by Emily Morrow

Art made in @ SangledHere on Twitter's character creator
